{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Meru Networks |model=AP832 |revision=i |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/22/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=USI |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=managed access point |fcc_id=RE7-AP832I,WA7-43460AC |ic_id=6749A-AP832I |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Freescale Semiconductor |cpu1_model=P1020 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL256P90TFCR2 |fla1_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B1G1646G-BCF8 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe,USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Broadcom BCM943460MC |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43460 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Broadcom BCM943460MC |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43460 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Vitesse |eth_chip2_model=VSC8601XKN |eth_chip3_brand=Vitesse |eth_chip3_model=VSC8601XKN |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Dual Radio Access Point'''
"Mt_Etna_V1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Per FCC docs, this device is using the following... *[[Freescale Semiconductor]] P1020 (P1020NSE2HFB) SoC *''Spansion'' S29GL256P90TFCR2 32MB Flash :Flash (NOR) is specified as 32MB *RAM is specified as 2x K4B1G1646G-BCF8 :(DDR III, 64Mx16, 1Gb) for 256MB total *two [[Broadcom]] BCM943460MC wireless modules *two ''Vitesse'' VSC8601XKN GbE PHYs *a ''SMSC'' USB3300 USB 2.0 PHY
{{WiFiCert|WFA50854|10/29/2013}}
